description.value:
Special: SM Wep, Tearing, Unwieldy, Power Field

Note: Space Marines Only, not easily acquirable. Two-Handed and Harness Mounted (can be fitted to Tech Marine Servo-harness, Grafted to Servitors, or used as a Cybernetic Limb). Used for breaching walls and bulkheads. When dealing Righteous Fury, double the damage roll (HB: For OW's RF, roll two dice).
